title: centro logo font
content:
hi Guys  
Does anyone know what font was used  
for this logo?

thanks a lot

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121094339im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/centro_5942.jpg)

 [‹ Help needed](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121094339/http:/www.typophile.com/node/50103 "Go to previous forum topic") [Help!! Futuristic Font ID?? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121094339/http:/www.typophile.com/node/49630 "Go to next forum topic")
author: agostini

comments.content:
Maybe you can use a font named METRO DF, they seems between them so much.  
If you cant find what you’re looking for i can send you the font i suggest.

Regards

not quite what im after falloguzman  
but thanks for your suggestion...
